name: Acolytes of Arachne
description:
"Acolytes of Arachne"

The cult of the spider goddess has finally found Her ancient temple. But will they be able to reach their goddess?

WASD/Arrow Keys: Move

Space: Jump

P: Pause

Q/E: Select Previous/Next Character

F: Fling Fire

Left Shift: Long Leap

H: Unhallowed Hymn 

X: Shattering Screech

Design, Art, Writing, and Code by Alexander Kazazis

https://fallingwallgames.itch.io

Music by Tony Longworth

https://tonylongworth.com/

Color palette: forest-glow by Jimison3 (with additions)

Forest Glow Palette (lospec.com)

Fonts Used: VeniceClassic by soixantedeux, Alkhemikal by jeti

Created in 10 days for Vimjam 3

https://itch.io/jam/vimjam3

Jam Focus: Multi-Use

Theme: Turn up the Heat

Content warning: Spiders, spiders, and spiders.
